data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Kuidong (2017): A new species of Placotrochides Alcock, 1902 (Anthozoa: Scleractinia: Flabellidae) from the tropical Western Pacific, including the deepest record of the genus. Zootaxa 4323 (1): 146-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.1.13
